#labels howto,installapps
= Introduction =

How to install apps in LiveAndroid


= Details =


== Browse apps: ==

http://www.cyrket.com/


== Install apps: ==

  # goto console: press ALT+F1
  # change current path: `cd /system/app`
  # download application: `wget http://65.99.230.146/md/1835012/PilotLines.apk`
  # goto home: press ALT+F7, you'll see app now. :)

== Use AndAppStore Client: ==

  # download http://andappstore.com/AndroidApplications/apps/125845!download
  # install app into liveandroid
  # you can see app http://twitpic.com/e4t27
  # click http://twitpic.com/e4t51  http://twitpic.com/e4t9p


== LiveAndroid v0.3 ==

  # you can download APK file directly from Browser
  # the APK file save at /sdcard/download
  # press ALT+F1
  # `cp /sdcard/download/* /system/app`
  # `chown 1000:1000 /system/app/*`
  # press ALT+F7, you'll see app now. :)
